data.event: Nicknamed "The Little Apple" as a play on New York City's "Big Apple", Manhattan is today best known as being the home of Kansas State University and has a distinct college town atmosphere.

event.title: was named an All-American City in 1952

data.event: The town was named an All-American City in 1952, becoming the first city in Kansas to win the award.
And in 2011 Forbes rated Manhattan No. 1 for "Best Small Communities for a Business and Career."
